Thank You

...for reading, for being here, for trying to understand.

"It seems very pretty," she said when she had finished it, "but it‚Äôs rather hard to understand!"
  • ToC

Thank you for reading 21 Lessons. I hope you enjoyed it. If you did, please leave a review on Amazon (or on Goodreads) and share it with your friends. If you didn‚Äôt, or have any suggestions for improvements, please reach out to me directly.

I am currently working on a second, more ambitious project: 21 Ways. You can support me on Patreon to get an exclusive glimpse and early access to current drafts, artwork, and other things. Your support allows me to allocate more time to writing and creating free, open-source education. It‚Äôs what I love to do. I hope that I will be able to dedicate all my time to it one day. To all of you who support me already: thank you. From the bottom of my heart. Thank you.
